citation.title: Calcareous electrochemical precipitation, a new method to trap nickel in seawater

news.title: Study Describes New Method to Remove Nickel from Contaminated Seawater
news.summary: The same deposit that builds up in many tea kettles or water pipes in areas where calcium-rich water is the norm might be just the (cheap) ticket to rid contaminated seawater of toxic metals.
